source.name: OCC Caseload/Disposition Summary - 1993-2009
source.description: Year-end overview(s) of cases opened, pending completion of investigation, closed and sustained. OCC investigates citizen complaints of police misconduct against SFPD officers. Complaints are considered sustained when at least one allegation against one officer in the case/incident has been found to have merit by a preponderance of the evidence.
